column2: "Hey, peon! Yes you, peon! When I say peon, I'm talking about you, peon!"
"Peon, are you an ARKS member? Tell me your name, or I'll blow you up!"
"<%me>? I suppose you are an ARKS member."
"What, me? You're asking who I am? You really lack common sense, peon!"
"My name is Claris Claes, one of the Council of Six!"
"Hey peon, cower in fear before me. Worship me. I am of the highest rank among the ARKS!"
"Hmm, looks like I'm too high above your lowly rank for you to even understand, peon! I'll let it slide this time."
"But more importantly, what are you doing here, peon? This area is not somewhere you're supposed to be."
"A quest, peon? You wandered here just for some quest?"
"My power is for blowing up Darkers. I wouldn't want to use it on you, peon. Forget about this place."
"Hm? Um... I think I went that way before..."
